product_name: Pearl Izumi Aurora Splice Knickers - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Why workout in the same old outfit? The women's Pearl Izumi Aurora Splice knickers are a great compromise between shorts and leggings. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric provides optimum muscle support, reduces fatigue and extends endurance. Mesh panels enhance ventilation and breathability. Flatlock seams reduce chafing whether you're running, hiking or doing aerobics. Elasticized waistband with a flat, stretchy drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Zippered back pocket stores accessories and internal pocket stores a key. Reflective accents increase visibility in dim light. Pearl Izumi Aurora Splice knickers are formfitting. Closeout.
short_description: Why workout in the same old outfit? The women's Pearl Izumi Aurora Splice knickers are a great compromise between shorts and leggings.
